alert.note: Alert for Sunflower (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 06 at 5:47PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Sunflower County through 615 PM CDT... At 547 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Parchman, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Parchman and Rome. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
